title: The Empire Strikes Back ... Against Canadian Truckers | Guests: Ezra Levant & Michael Malice | 2/18/22
description:
The government is coming down on gold and cryptocurrency. Rebel News founder Ezra Levant joins Glenn to discuss the latest on Canada’s attack on the Freedom Convoy and how it can affect Americans. Bill O’Reilly joins to for his weekly news recap, discussing Canada and the economy. Author Michael Malice joins Glenn to discuss Justin Trudeau, his actions toward the Freedom Convoy, and how it may end. Head writer and chief researcher for Glenn Beck Jason Buttrill joins Glenn and Stu to discuss the Russia-Ukraine controversy. Stephen Kent, author of "How the Force Can Fix the World: Lessons on Life, Liberty, and Happiness from a Galaxy Far, Far Away,” joins to discuss Canada and how the controversy parallels a scene from "Star Wars."
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
